div.head: Plates
div.p:
svasti śrīmatāṁ sakala-bhuvana-saṁstūyamāna-mānavya-sagotrāṇāṁ hāritī-putrāṇāṁ sa
pta-loka-mātr̥bhir mātr̥bhir abhivarddhitānāM kārttikeya-parirakṣaṇa-prāpta-rājya-vibhavānāṁ bhaga
van-nārāyaṇa-prasāda-saṁvmāsādita-varāha-lāñcchanekṣaṇa-kṣaṇa-vaśīkr̥tāśeṣa-mahiībhr̥
tāṁ mahiī-bhr̥tām ivācala-sthitīnāM Aśva-medhāvabhr̥ttha-snānāpanīta-kali-malānāṁ calu
kyānāṁ kulam alaṁkariṣṇuoḥ Aneka-samara-saṁghaṭṭopalabdha-vijaya-patākāvabhāsitāśeṣa-di
g-maṇḍalasya viṣṇuvarddhana-mahārājasya pautraḥ sakalāvatni-pati-makuṭa-taṭa-ghaṭita-maṇi-mayūkkha-puñja
-mañjarita-caraṇa-saroruhasyaḥ samādhikr̥riyā-samāsādita-sarvva-siddheḥ jayasiṁha-vallabha-ma
hārājasyaḥ priyānujasyendra-sama-vikramasyendrabhaṭṭārakasya priyatanayaḥ śakti-trayānamitā
neka-rājanya-mukha-kamala-sabhābhyarccita-caraṇa-yugaḷaḥ catur-udadhi-velā-valaya-pa
ryyanta-prāpta-kīrttiḥ manvādi-praṇīta-dharmma-śāstra-pracarita-sarvva-lokāśrayaḥ cakrāa-dhara Iva
cakra-varttitaā-lakṣanālaṁkr̥ta-śarīraḥ parama-māheśvaro mātā-pitr̥-pādānudhyātaḥ śrī-viṣṇuvarddhana
-mahārājaḥ sarvvān evam ājñāpayati

viditam astu sarvveṣāM| karmmarāṣṭra-viṣaye pasiṇḍi-paṁṟunidḷu
-mrānumi-delkontha-rāvinūyu Ity etasya grāma-madhyamasya reyūru-nāma-grāmaḥ bhāradvāja-go
trāya nāgaśarmmaṇaḥ pautrāya Agniśarmmaṇaḥ putraāya kuṇḍiśarmmaṇe dvāśadaśāṁśaḥ| bbhāradvāja-go
trāya nāgaśarmmaṇaḥ pautrāya śaṁkaraśarmmaṇaḥ putrāya maṇḍaśarmmaṇe
daśāṁśaḥ| punar bhāradvāja-gotrāya nāgaśarmmaṇaḥ putrāya kumāraśarmmaṇe
Aṣṭāṁśaḥ|| kauṇḍilya-gotrāya śaṁkaraśarmmaṇe dvayaṁśaḥdvy-aṁśaḥ|| kauṇḍilya-gotrāya kumā
raśarmmaṇe dvayaṁśaḥdvy-aṁśaḥ| tasyānuja Agniśarmmaṇe dvayaṁśaḥdvy-aṁśaḥ|| Ālaboyasya kauṇḍilya
-gotrasya kattiśarmmaṇa putra kandaśarmmaṇa putra kappaśarmmaṇa catāri Aṁśaḥ| puna
kappaśarmmaṇa Eka Aṁśaḥ| puna revaśarmmaṇa dve Aṁśaḥ| puna kandaśarmmaṇa dve
Aṁśaḥ puna kandaśarmmaṇa Arddhāṁśaḥ|| koyilaboyasya bhāradvāja-gotra bā
diśarmmaṇa muyyarddhaṁśaḥ| Utpitoṟuboyasya kāṇva-gotra pālaśarmma
ṇa Ekāṁśaḥ|| kavilaboyasya gautama-gotra kuṇḍiśarmmaṇa ekkaṁśaḥ|| Ala
puṁnaboyasya kāśyāapa-gotrāya842 bpādiśarmmaṇa Ekaṁśaḥ|| ciṁthūrboyasya
@@@bhāradvāja-gotrāya844 sarvvaśarmmaṇe845 ek(k)aṁśaḥ846| mudubaṁboyasya kauṇḍilya-gotrāya847 sarvvaśarmmaṇaḥ putrāya848 jeṭṭiśarmmaṇe849 ek(k)āṁśaḥ850| puna kuṇḍiśarmmaṇe851 ek(k)āṁśaḥ852| puna śaṁkaraśarmmaṇe853 ek(k)āṁśaḥ854| puna sarvvaśarmmaṇe855 ek(k)āṁśaḥ856| puna ḻuddaśarmmaṇe857 ek(k)āṁśaḥ858| kattiśarmmaṇaḥ putra[sya*] aṁjaśarmmaṇaḥ putrāya859 kattiśarmmaṇe860 ek(k)āṁśaḥ861| puna sarvvaśarmmaṇe862 tiṇṇi aṁśaḥ| devaśarmmaṇaḥ putrāya863 samudraśarmmaṇe864 ek(k)āṁśaḥ865| puna jeṭṭiśarmmaṇe866 ek(k)āṁśaḥ867| anantaśarmmaṇaḥ putrāya868 aṁjaśarmmaṇe869 ek(k)āṁśaḥ870| pālaśarmmaṇaḥ putrāya871 revaśarmmaṇe872 tiṁni aṁśaḥ|
Face IVa. puḻolūrboyasya putrāya873 vasuśarmmaṇe874 ekāṁśaḥ875| benbidiboyasya putrāya876 āruvaśarmmaṇe877 ek(k)āṁśaḥ878| puna vedaśarmmaṇe879 ek(k)āṁśaḥ880| penbidiboyasya kauṇḍilya-gotrāya881 jakkiśarmmaṇe882 ek(k)āṁśaḥ883| keśavaboyasya vebaśarmmaṇe884 ek(k)āṁśaḥ885| bhāradvāja-gotrāya886 agniśarmmaṇaḥ putrasya887 vināyaśarmmaṇaḥ putrāya sarvvaśarmmaṇe @dvayaṁśaḥdvy-aṁśaḥ| kauṇḍilya-gotrāya889 veṁṇiśarmmaṇaḥ putrasya890 nandiśarmmmaṇaḥ putrāya891 vāsudevaśarmmaṇe @dvayaṁśaḥdvy-aṁśaḥ| kauṇḍilya-gotrāya893 vināyaśarmmaṇaḥ putrasya894 nandiśarmmmaṇaḥ [putrāya*] nāgaśarmmaṇe @dvayaṁśaḥdvy-aṁśaḥ| paummuddiboyasya kauṇḍilya-gotrāya 896 devaśarmmaṇe897 @dvayaṁśaḥdvy-aṁśaḥ| puna bādiśarmmaṇe899 ek(k)āṁśaḥ 900//
Face IVb. dūdiboyasya kauṇḍilya-gotrāya901 gabotaśarmmaṇe902 ekāṁśaḥ 903// toṇḍadūrboyasya kauśika-gotrāya904 revaśarmmaṇe905 ekāṁśaḥ 906// ceyūrboyasya kauṇḍilya-gotrāya907 revaśarmmaṇe908 muyyarddhāṁśaḥ909| miṟiboyasya kāśyapa910-gotrāya911 anantaśarmmaṇe912 @dvayaṁśaḥdvy-aṁśaḥ| mudugonthaboyasya bhāradvāja-gotrāya914 duggaśarmmaṇe915 ekāṁśa 916| canthrūrboyasya kāśyapa917-gotrāya918 pālaśarmmaṇe919 catur920 aṁśaḥ| māraṭaboyasya kauṇḍilya-gotrāya921 veṇṇiśarmmaṇe922 ekāṁśaḥ 923| muddamūrboyasya kāśyapa924-gotrāya925 revaśarmmaṇe926 ekāṁśaḥ927| puna revaśarmmaṇe928 ekāṁśaḥ 929|
Face Va. boppiboyasya kāśyapa930- gotrāya931 kumāraśarmmaṇe932 ekāṁśaḥ 933| ponnaḷūrboyasya kāśyapa934- gotrāya935 sarvvaśarmmaṇe936 @dvayaṁśaḥdvy-aṁśaḥ| vegiṁboyasya kāśyapa938- gotrāya939 kuṇḍiśarmmaṇe940 ekāṁśaḥ 941| kutmurboyasya bhāradvāja- gotrāya942 ḻuddaśarmmaṇe943 ekāṁśaḥ 944| kondāḻiboyasya kāśyapa945- gotrāya946 kuṇḍiśarmmaṇe947 ekāṁśaḥ 948| muttinthiboyasya kauṇḍilya- gotrāya949 veṇṇiśarmmaṇe950 ekāṁśaḥ 951| alabuṁnaboyasya kauṇḍilya- gotrāya952 bhaṭṭiśarmmaṇe953 arddhāṁśaḥ 954| keśavaboyasya bhāradvāja- gotrāya955 vināyaśarmmaṇe956 ekāṁśaḥ 957| puna vināyaśarmmaṇe958 ekāṁśaḥ 959| rā[ṁ*]pu(ṁ)rboyasya kauṇḍilya- gotrāya960 jeṭṭiśarmmaṇe961 ekāṁśaḥ 962|
Face Vb. pulkonthaboyasya kāśyapa963- gotrāya964revaśarmmaṇe965 ekāṁśaḥ 966| pandiriboya[sya*] bhāradvāja- gotrāya967 pavvaśarmmaṇe968 ekāṁśaḥ969| keśavaboyasya vināyaśarmmaṇe970 ekāṁśaḥ 971| puna vināyaśarmmaṇe972 ekāṁśaḥ 973| māraṭaboyasya kauṇḍilya- gotrāya974 cāmuṇḍiśarmmaṇe975 ekāṁśaḥ 976| puna śiv(v)aśarmmaṇe977 ekāṁśaḥ 978| rekādiboyasya kāśyapa979- gotrāya980doṇaśarmmaṇe981 ekāṁśaḥ 982| puna rekādiboyasya revaśarmmaṇe983 ekāṁśaḥ 984| munikolboyasya bhāradvāja- gotrāya985 kandaśarmmaṇe986 ekāṁśaḥ 987| cebuṁdothiboyasya kāśyapa988- gotrāya989 vīraśarmmaṇe990 ekāṁśaḥ991|
Face VIa. eddoṇḍiboyasya kāśyapa992- gotrāya993nāgaśarmmaṇe994 ekāṁśaḥ 995| ḻuttaḷūrboyasya kāśyapa996- gotrāya997nāgaśarmmaṇe998 ekāṁśaḥ 999| ciccakudiboyasya kāśyapa1000- gotrāya1001 nandiśarmmaṇe1002 ekāṁśaḥ 1003| samatiboyasya veṇṇiśarmmaṇe1004 ekāṁśaḥ 1005| maṁduboyasya bhāradvājagotrāya1006 kattaśarmmaṇe1007 @dvayaṁśaḥdvy-aṁśaḥ|
Face VIb. balavijayārogyanimittam @āsmabhiḥ saṁprāptaḥ| gamyā rājavallabhāḥ1009 sarvvaparihāraiḥ pariharantu parihārayantu| api ca teśāṁ1010 ślokāḥ| bhūmidānāt paran dānam na bhūtan na bhaviṣyati[+|] tasyaiva haraṇāt pāpan na bhūtan na bhaviṣyati[+||](1)
Face VIIa. bahubhir vvasudhā dattā bahubiś cānupālitā[+|] yasya yasya yadā bhūmiḥ tasya tasya tadā1011 phalam[+||] (2) varddhamānarājya-dvit[ī]ya1012-saṁvatsare caitra-māse śuklapakṣe daśyamyāṁ maghā **1013 nakṣatre budha-vāreṣu svamukhājñāptā[d*] dīrgocāyi** 1014 veḷayilkanmaṟakuṇḍi eṟasya putra[sya*] vināyakasya likhitam śāsanam idam

app.note: While puñja must have been intended, the engraved character is conspicuously not ñja (compare l7, mañjarita) and looks rather like ṇḍa (compare l15, maṇḍa and especially l12, pasiṇḍi).
The anusvāra is on top of ka, pushed out of its proper place by the descenders of putra above.

Up to the end of the second plate, the language (including that of the executive section) was a close approximation of standard Sanskrit and included some corrections where the originally inscribed text was not up to standard. From this point on, however, editorial corrections are absent and the language is noticeably non-standard (and perhaps progressively more so). Therefore I apply editorial correction and normalisation in the edition up to this point but, like Fleet, I abstain from doing so henceforward.

I accept Fleet's reading, but have some doubts about reading a dot placed at the baseline between the first and the second character as an anusvāra, and wonder if perhaps viṣṇuboyasya had been intended and misinterpreted by the engraver.
